response.overview: A documentary narrated by music and guided by instrumental encounters. A young sir, loyal to his small town, sleeps dreaming about conducting an orchestra and wakes up living as a maestro. The movie presents Wilson Laerte, a passionate pianist from Alegre, ES, Brazil. The history portrays his legacy of dedication to the music, and brings the feelings that integrate the memory of this man.
response.title: The Maestro Himself
